About Me

My name is Brady London. I chose the AI pathway because I was already intrigued about AI and how it worked and could help me. I also know AI will continue to grow so I thought it was a good path to choose. AI helped me with my project by giving me information and helping me find sources. I also used AI to help me write some of my paragraphs. I learned a lot about meteorology and how AI is used in the field. I also learned a lot about AI and how it works. Overall, I really enjoyed this project and I am glad I chose the AI pathway.
